fisrt_run_help: Executable file and 'resources' folder must be in the same folder. Otherwise, this manager will not run properly.
restore_warning:
Are you sure you want to restore from this file?
ALL CURRENT FFXIV DATA(except screenshots) WILL BE DELETED before resotarion.
reset_warning:
This will reset settings. Continue?
(Program will be closed after reset)
settings_instructions: All settings will be enabled when you restart the program.
